transaction.name: TransactionType
transaction.doc: Represents a category or a type of transaction

props.doc: Id of the parent type of this type. None if this is a root/main category.

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Reference to the user that created this transaction type

transaction.name: PartyEntry
transaction.doc: Represents a transaction party as described on a bank statement

props.name: name
props.doc: Name of this entity, just as it appeared on a bank statement

transaction.name: Transaction
transaction.doc: Represents a transaction from or to a bank account. Only includes data from a bank statement.

props.name: accountId
props.doc: Id of the account on which this transaction was made

props.name: date
props.doc: Date when this transaction occurred (e.g. date of purchase)

props.name: recordDate
props.doc: Date when this transaction was recorded / actuated on the bank account.

props.name: amount
props.doc: The size of the transaction in â‚¬. Positive amounts indicate balance added to the account. Negative values indicate withdrawals or purchases.

props.name: otherPartyEntryId
props.doc: Id of the other party of this transaction, as it appears on this original statement.

props.name: referenceCode
props.doc: Reference code mentioned on the transaction

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who added this entry. None if unknown or if not applicable.
Time when this entry was cancelled / removed. None while valid.

transaction.name: TransactionEvaluation
transaction.doc: Lists information that's added on top of a raw transaction record. Typically based on user input.

props.name: typeId
props.doc: Id of the assigned type of this transaction

props.name: vatRatio
props.doc: Ratio of VAT applied to this transaction, where 0.5 is 50% and 1.0 is 100%.

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who added this evaluation. None if unknown or if not applicable.
Time when this evaluation was replaced or cancelled. None while valid.

props.name: manual
props.doc: Whether this evaluation is manually performed by a human. False if performed by an algorithm.
